# Ignore everything in the bin folder
bin/*

#Uchebnik temp folder
Uchebnik/

# Except nuget.exe
!bin/nuget.exe

# Ignore other common files
obj/
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.log
*.cache
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
.nuget/

# Visual Studio
.vs/
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Rider
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/
*.code-workspace

# DotNet Specific
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/
*.deps.json
*.runtimeconfig.json

# Logs
*.log
logs/


# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini

# Generated files
tessdata/
tessdata_best/
tessdata_fast/

# Configuration files
*.config
*.json
appsettings*.json

# Exclude Tesseract binary models if dynamically generated
bul.traineddata

# Other IDE-specific files
*.idea/
_ReSharper.Caches/

#Ocr resource folder
*.png
